headline: Should Investors Reconsider Prudential Financial After Stocks Slide Nearly 5% This Week?
summary: If you're sitting on the fence about Prudential Financial stock, you're not alone. With a history as sturdy as its name, but recent swings that may have made some investors anxious, it is only natural to wonder whether now is the time to buy, hold, or take profits. Over just the past week, shares have slipped by 4.7%, adding to a 7.3% drop over the last month. The year-to-date return stands at -16.2%, echoing a similar trend over the last 12 months. Despite this, Prudential’s longer-term...
